message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $100. That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
